sense.def:
Z izrazom
really
lahko poudarimo tisto, kar rečemo.

Z izrazom
really
pokažemo, da navajamo resnična dejstva o nečem, ne pa nekaj neresničnega.

seg.quote: I want to know what really happened.
He's not really going for a bath; he's going to sit in the garden.
Do you really think they bother to listen to us?
Is there really anything new to say about him?

sense.def:
Izraz
really
lahko dodamo zanikanim trditvam, da ne bi zvenele nevljudno.

seg.quote: I'm not really in favour of that.

sense.def:
‘Really?’
lahko rečemo, če želimo izraziti veliko zanimanje, presenečenje ali dvom.

seg.quote: ‘It was quite close to the airport.’—‘Really?’
‘Inflation's dropped faster than it did under Labour.’—‘Has it really?’
